hide-button-id.name: Hide Folder ID in Button
hide-button-id.description: Hides the folder ID inside the folder button.

hide-title-id.name: Hide Folder ID in Title
hide-title-id.description: Hides the folder ID in the title when a folder is selected.

disable-notification.name: Hide Move Notification
disable-notification.description: Hides the notification when moving a level.

enable-moving-folders.name: Enable Moving Folders
enable-moving-folders.description: Enables move buttons for folders, they look kinda ugly tho.
